tool_description: Researches and suggests relevant hashtags based on content topic, platform, and engagement potential.

content_topic.description: Main topic or keyword for hashtag research

platform.description: Target social media platform: instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, or facebook

hashtag_mix.description: Strategy for hashtag popularity: trending_only, balanced, or niche_focused

max_hashtags.description: Maximum number of hashtags to return (5-30)

competition_level.description: Target competition level: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Invalid platform: Use one of [instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, facebook]
Invalid hashtag mix: Use one of [trending_only, balanced, niche_focused]
Invalid max_hashtags: Must be between 5 and 30
Invalid competition level: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Empty content topic: Provide a specific topic or keyword for hashtag research
usage: Enter your content topic, target platform, and hashtag strategy. Optionally set maximum hashtags, branded hashtag inclusion, and competition level. Returns optimized hashtag suggestions with engagement metrics.

recommended_hashtags.description: List of recommended hashtags without # symbol

hashtag_categories.description: Categories for each hashtag: trending, niche, branded, or location

estimated_reach.description: Estimated reach level for each hashtag: high, medium, or low

total_estimated_impressions.description: Combined estimated impressions range for all hashtags
